thread.section_title: Speke Resort and Conference Centre - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great conference facilities
thread.title_full: Great conference facilities - Review of Speke Resort and Conference Centre, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Sagar V
title: Great conference facilities
text:
This is the best venue for conferences/workshops. They have all the facilities in the Hall. I was here for 5days workshop. Rooms are extraordinary, beautiful and so comfortable. They have amazing big green gardens. The breakfast buffet is delicious with so much of options, lunch and dinner was fantastic too. The Olympic size pool is the best place to relax in the evenings.
Enjoyed my stay here. Will come back again.
Thank you
